lead_paragraph: Ms. Elia, a former superintendent of schools in Hillsborough County, Fla., will preside over hotly contested issues like the future of the Common Core standards in the state’s classrooms.

headline.print_headline: State Education Dept. Gets New Leader Amid Debates Over Testing and Standards
headline.main: MaryEllen Elia Named New York State Education Commissioner

snippet: Ms. Elia, a former superintendent of schools in Hillsborough County, Fla., will preside over hotly contested issues like the future of the Common Core standards in the state’s classrooms.
abstract: New York State Board of Regents appoints MaryEllen Elia, former superintendent of schools in Hillsborough County, Fla, as education commissioner; Elia faces difficult decisions regarding Common Core standards, standardized testing and teacher evaluations.
